newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan industry output price index up 1.2 pct/Q2.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan industry output price index up 1.2 pct/Q2.

text.p: Morocco's industry, mining and energy output price index rose 1.2 percent to 361.9 points in the second quarter of the year compared with the same period in 1995, the Statistics Directorate said.
"Energy group index registered a significant rise of 4.4 percent due mainly to price increase of refined oil and derivatives," the Directorate said.
Industry group index rose 0.9 percent due largerly to variations of metallurgic and food industry prices, compared with the same period last year, it added.
